original_text:
Captain Jack
Non sarà il Jack che ci si aspettava, ma è pur sempre un pirata. Andiamo a parlare di una slot machine online che parte dalla tematica piratesca per sviluppare una serie di bonus e funzioni che attireranno numerosi giocatori. Captain Jack è uno dei titoli più curiosi che siano mai stati prodotti dalla software house Tuko. E da bravi sostenitori del made in Italy non potevamo non recensirla!
Non troviamo l’attesissimo Jack Sparrow, ma un anziano pirata che si trova da solo su un’isola deserta, dove è chiamato a proteggere i tesori che sono nascosti da anni. E’ chiaro che la sua intenzione non sia quella di condividere questa sua fortuna, ma sta al giocatore riuscire a trovare la chiave giusta (con un pizzico di fortuna) per attivare bonus e funzionalità extra per rubargli il bottino. Di seguito scopriremo le caratteristiche tecniche e grafiche di questa slot machine, oltre a tutte le curiosità che la rendono così divertente!
Grafica e funzioni di gioco
La slot Captain Jack ha una grafica semplice ma bella, talmente attenta da presentare anche delle animazioni in 3D. Conta 5 rulli e le 20 payline che vedono alternarsi un vasto numero di figure e simboli speciali. E quali possono essere visto che parliamo di un contesto piratesco? Abbiamo una bandiera con tanto di Teschio, una Spada, un’Ancora, uno Scrigno, un Cannone, un Timone e molto altro ancora. Tra i simboli speciali tornano gli imperdibili Wild e Scatter. Il primo, ovvero il jolly del gioco, è rappresentato dallo Scrigno del Tesoro, che è capace di aiutre il giocatore a ottenere delle combinazioni fortunate con il suo allineamento sul tabellone di gioco. Può prendere il valore di ogni altra icona ma non dello Scatter. Questo è rappresentato dalla Bandiera col Teschio, che ha un compito speciale: deve attivare le giocate gratuite, oppure può anche offrire moltiplicazioni rispetto alla scommessa standard. E’ necessario però che si posizioni sui rulli, in qualsiasi punto, almeno per 3 simboli. Purtroppo qui abbiamo trovato una piccola nota dolente: rispetto a molte altre slot ha un limite di numero giri. Il bonus spin offre solo 3 giri, che è altamente al di sotto della media; è anche vero per che potranno essere riattivati fino a 20. E inoltre viene aggiunto anche il bonus game che permette di moltiplicare le giocate effettuate così da aumentare il premio finale. In questo caso è necessario che si posizionino almeno 3 simboli della Mappa ma solo sui rulli 2, 3 e 4. A quel punto potrai partecipare a una vera caccia al tesoro: troverai davanti a te sullo schermo 8 scrigni che devi aprire per poter incassare il premio.
Considerazioni finali sulla slot Captain Jack
La fase di test di questa macchinetta online è nel complesso positiva e l’esperienza non è stata affatto deludente. Il gioco prevede una puntata minima di 0,02cent per arrivare a 20 euro. La puntata di default è fissata a 0,2€ con possibilità di usare una moneta per payline. Abbiamo 20 payline e un numero massimo di free spin pari a 3. La percentuale di ritorno al giocatore in vincite arriva al 96,35%.

raw_translation.response:
Captain Jack may not be your typical Jack, but he's still a pirate. Let's talk about an online slot machine that takes the pirate theme and develops a series of bonuses and features that will attract numerous players. Captain Jack is one of the most curious titles ever produced by the software house Tuko. And as proud supporters of made in Italy, we couldn't help but review it!

We don't find the much-awaited Jack Sparrow, but an old pirate who is alone on a deserted island, where he is called upon to protect treasures that have been hidden for years. It's clear that his intention is not to share his fortune, but it's up to the player to find the right key (with a touch of luck) to activate  bonuses and extra features to steal his loot. Below, we will discover the technical and graphic characteristics of this slot machine, as well as all the quirks that make it so much fun!

Graphics and Gameplay Features
The Captain Jack slot has a simple yet beautiful graphics, so attentive it even presents 3D animations. It has 5 reels and 20 pay lines that alternate a large number of figures and special symbols. And what can be expected from a pirate context situation? We have a flag complete with a Skull, a Sword, an Anchor, a Chest, a Cannon, a Helm, and much more. Among the special symbols, we have the unmissable Wilds and Scatters. The first, the game's wildcard, is represented by the Treasure Chest, which can help players obtain lucky combinations with its alignment on the game board. It can take on the value of any other icon but not the Scatter. This is represented by the Flag with the Skull, which has a special task: it must activate free spins, or it can also offer multipliers compared to the standard bet. It's necessary, however, for it to position itself on the reels, anywhere, at least for three symbols. Unfortunately, we found a small sore note here: compared to many other slots, it has a limited number of spins. The bonus spin offers only three spins, which is highly below average, but it is also true that these spins can be reactivated up to 20 times. A bonus game is added that allows players to multiply the bets made to increase the final prize. In this case, it's necessary to position at least three symbols of the Map but only on reels 2, 3, and 4. At that point, you can participate in a real treasure hunt: eight chests will appear on the screen in front of you, which you must open to collect the prize.

Final Thoughts on the Captain Jack Slot
The testing phase of this online machine is generally positive, and the experience is not disappointing at all. The game requires a minimum bet of 0.02 cents and can go up to 20 euros. The default bet is set at €0.2 with the possibility of using one coin per pay line. We have 20 pay lines and a maximum number of free spins equal to three. The percentage of return to the player in winnings reaches 96.35%. As an experienced gambler, one can look forward to the exciting gameplay and bonuses offered by Captain Jack.

Review: Captain Jack may not be your typical Jack, but he's still a pirate. Let's talk about an online slot machine that takes the pirate theme and develops a series of bonuses and features that will attract numerous players. Captain Jack is one of the most curious titles ever produced by the software house Tuko. And as proud supporters of made in Italy, we couldn't help but review it!

We don't find the much-awaited Jack Sparrow, but an old pirate who is alone on a deserted island, where he is called upon to protect treasures that have been hidden for years. It's clear that his intention is not to share his fortune, but it's up to the player to find the right key (with a touch of luck) to activate  bonuses and extra features to steal his loot. Below, we will discover the technical and graphic characteristics of this slot machine, as well as all the quirks that make it so much fun!

Graphics and Gameplay Features
The Captain Jack slot has a simple yet beautiful graphics, so attentive it even presents 3D animations. It has 5 reels and 20 pay lines that alternate a large number of figures and special symbols. And what can be expected from a pirate context situation? We have a flag complete with a Skull, a Sword, an Anchor, a Chest, a Cannon, a Helm, and much more. Among the special symbols, we have the unmissable Wilds and Scatters. The first, the game's wildcard, is represented by the Treasure Chest, which can help players obtain lucky combinations with its alignment on the game board. It can take on the value of any other icon but not the Scatter. This is represented by the Flag with the Skull, which has a special task: it must activate free spins, or it can also offer multipliers compared to the standard bet. It's necessary, however, for it to position itself on the reels, anywhere, at least for three symbols. Unfortunately, we found a small sore note here: compared to many other slots, it has a limited number of spins. The bonus spin offers only three spins, which is highly below average, but it is also true that these spins can be reactivated up to 20 times. A bonus game is added that allows players to multiply the bets made to increase the final prize. In this case, it's necessary to position at least three symbols of the Map but only on reels 2, 3, and 4. At that point, you can participate in a real treasure hunt: eight chests will appear on the screen in front of you, which you must open to collect the prize.

Final Thoughts on the Captain Jack Slot
The testing phase of this online machine is generally positive, and the experience is not disappointing at all. The game requires a minimum bet of 0.02 cents and can go up to 20 euros. The default bet is set at €0.2 with the possibility of using one coin per pay line. We have 20 pay lines and a maximum number of free spins equal to three. The percentage of return to the player in winnings reaches 96.35%. As an experienced gambler, one can look forward to the exciting gameplay and bonuses offered by Captain Jack.
